text:
You plunge into the Molten Depths, where flame has become breath and the stone itself writhes with heat. The very earth groans beneath your feet, cracked open like a festering wound. Rivers of lava pulse like veins beneath a crust of blackened rock, and distant roars echo through the infernal chasms. The air is thick with ash, each breath a sacrifice.

Deep within these scorched catacombs lies a forge abandoned by gods — or perhaps stolen from them. Here, the Flamebound once crafted weapons not of steel, but of memory and fire. Now only husks remain, their runes flickering with forgotten purpose. As you tread deeper, a name rises unbidden in your mind: _Pyrecrown._ You do not know why it matters, but it does.
lore: The Molten Depths were once the sacred forge of the Ember Covenant, keepers of the Living Flame. When the First Shattering came, they tried to melt their souls into fire itself, binding themselves to eternity. Most failed. Some… linger still.
